name: Joomfind
tagline: A script for detecting Joomla CMS
body:
JoomFind v0.1
========

_Developed & maintained by [Jasdev Singh](https://github.com/jazdev/)_

This script allows fast and easy detection of the Joomla Content Management System.

Disclaimer : 
This script is made only for educational and offline self-testing purposes. The creator of this script is not responsible or accountable for any damage or loss caused due to unauthorized running of this script.

This script is provided AS IS without any warranties of any kind. 

Usage:

	python JoomFind.py -f filepath [-v]
	
	Put URL(s) to scan in a newline delimited file

	URL(s) must point to homepage (root) where the CMS has been installed

Options:

	-f filename    (specify input file)

	-v, --verbose  (show detailed output)

	--help         (displays this help text)

Results:

The results are stored in a separate file.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
